titles.title: Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Reauthorization Act of 2009
Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Reauthorization Act of 2009
Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Reauthorization Act of 2009
Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Reauthorization Act of 2009
To amend and reauthorize the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Insular Affairs, Oceans and Wildlife.
Subcommittee on Insular Affairs, Oceans and Wildlife Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 111-297.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 167.

action.text: Mr. Sablan moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3537.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works Subcommittee on Water and Wildlife. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 111-174.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 357.

bill.summary: 4/26/2010--Reported to Senate without amendment. Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Reauthorization Act of 2009 - Amends the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994 to: (1) require reports every five years on the status of the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program in each state; and (2) authorize appropriations for the administrative expenses of the Program through FY2015.
